title: Go to another dimension/ Incredible hypnotic induction *non-verbal hypnosis*
description:
Dr. Marco Paret will demonstrate us an incredible hypnotic induction. These images are from the Masterclass in Russia and  the subject entered in a state of ecstasy, when the body is closer to the universe and the mind can reach his deepest self,  the subject goes to another dimension. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
